action.action-desc: Mr. Hill introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the Securities and Exchange Commission from finalizing the proposed rule titled The Enhancement and Standardization of Climate-Related Disclosures for Investors, and for other purposes.

section.text: The Securities and Exchange Commission may not finalize the proposed rule titled The Enhancement and Standardization of Climate-Related Disclosures for Investors (87 Fed. Reg. 21334; published April 11, 2022) or implement or enforce such a finalized rule or any substantially similar rule.
